anathema: Deride sacred ceremonies, carelessly or lazily perform rituals, destroy ceremonial objects
edict: Serve leaders of ceremonies, craft ceremonial arms and armor, lead a congregation

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Winlas (The Elder of Divinity)](/Deities.aspx?ID=656)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 13

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Serve leaders of ceremonies, craft ceremonial arms and armor, lead a congregation

**Anathema** Deride sacred ceremonies, carelessly or lazily perform rituals, destroy ceremonial objects

**Area of Concern**
Ceremonies, religiousness, service

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)

**Favored Weapon** [Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=362)

**Domains** [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=109), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=123)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Share Lore](/Spells.aspx?ID=2363)

- **3rd**
[Veil of Privacy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1739)

- **4th**
[Infectious Melody](/Spells.aspx?ID=933)

</column>
